title: Machado
body: Frutuoso refers to the peak of Lopo Machado, above the hermitage of Nossa Senhora das Neves, but Dr. Azevedo says that the surname Machado comes from Jo達o Machado de Miranda, a native of Guimar達es, who came to Madeira at the call of his uncle Bartolomeu Machado, as he had no heirs of his wife D. Francisca Velosa, and both instituted an entail of their assets in the descent of the said nephew.

Guimar達es: City of origin of Jo達o Machado de Miranda

Frutuoso: Historian who refers to the peak of Lopo Machado
Dr. Azevedo: Source that mentions the origin of the surname Machado
